channel.title: Custom quest
channel.description:
Ok, I have been trying to get a custom quest template that someone else has on there server. Also if you can code it for me then it would be great. Basically i want it so you click on a npc, it says a few lines, then teleports you to somewhere, then i wanna make it so they have to find a npc, when they do, they get a item. If you give me the code, i can edit it.
Ill respect you if u help me :)
Thanks,
Callum
